entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 9:09 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: N 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow early this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
